column4: Tesla to recall 8 898 vehicles in China from June 28: China quality watchdog
column5: BEIJING China's quality watchdog said on Monday that Tesla Inc  will recall a total of 8 898 Model S vehicles in the country starting on June 28  as part of a broader  global recall announced last month.

column4: UPDATE 1-Tesla to recall 8 898 vehicles in China from June 28 -China quality watchdog
column5: BEIJING  April 9 China's quality watchdog said on Monday that Tesla Inc will recall a total of 8 898 Model S vehicles in the country starting on June 28  as part of a broader  global recall announced last month.

column4: UPDATE 2-China's SenseTime valued at $4.5 bln after Alibaba-led funding -sources
column5: * Funding comes as government targets AI tech top spot (Recasts)

column4: China's SenseTime closes $600 mln funding led by Alibaba
column5: HONG KONG  April 9 Chinese facial recognition firm SenseTime Group Ltd said it has closed a $600 million funding round led by Alibaba Group Holding Ltd  extending the billion-dollar valuation of the artificial intelligence (AI) startup.
